{{Quote|I am in charge now! And the first thing you need to know is that if I am not happy, no one is happy.|Gryff Whitehill to [[Ironrath]] residents|The Sword in the Darkness}}

'''Gryff Whitehill''' is a character in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]'' and is the fourthborn son of Lord [[Ludd Whitehill]].
sections.Biography:
===Background===
==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
When [[Ramsay Snow]] states that a garrison of Whitehill men will be stationed in [[Ironrath]] depending on how Lord [[Ethan Forrester|Ethan]] responds Ramsay will ask Ludd Whitehill if he has someone he can trust to lead the garrison, Ludd confirms this and states that his son Gryff will lead it.<ref>"[[Iron From Ice]]"</ref>

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
Lord Whitehill bursts in on [[Rodrik Forrester]] and explains that his son Gryff is on his way from [[Harrenhal]] to meet up with the Whitehill's garrison at Ironrath. He will lead them to ensure the [[House Forrester|Forresters]] stay in line. It is also mentioned that Gryff is the fourth born son of Ludd Whitehill.<ref>"[[The Lost Lords]]"</ref>

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Gryff appears in person in this episode. He is an aggressive, pushy man who desires to rule a castle of his own, and takes much pleasure in usurping control of Ironrath and humiliating Rodrik, its legitimate lord.
